name: SCCM TreeView
short_description: This project arose out of my frustration at not being able to easily remove machines from collections which had been populated from Active Directory groups. Every script I came across was built for dealing with machines added directly. For those, though, one would be required to know the CollectionID of the collection and pass that to the script. I thought - as I tend to do - "Aren't these machines meant to make my life easy?" so that, coupled with the fact that there seems to be *no* scripts for dealing with query-added machines, I set about building...er...this!
